EmailTemplate.name: 17.AMS.SmallCell.none.N.G.N.17207.Small Cells Campaign 2017.Email 1 - Small Cell
EmailTemplate.subject: Treat your best customers to the best experiences
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> How Nokia Small Cells provide high-quality services in all locations The highest spending mobile broadband users often live and work in cities. They need the best connectivity. When your network delivers an always superior customer experience; winning revenue becomes easier. The right small cells technology makes all the difference. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
